room_title: Escape room "The President’s Bunker" by The Great Escape Room in Grand Rapids
review: Chris was a lot of fun to have in the President's Bunker room with us. He has a great sense of humor and was supportive as we struggled to find clues. As it turned out, we didn't need all the clues. We figured it out ourselves!

room_title: Escape room "The President’s Bunker" by The Great Escape Room in Grand Rapids
review: We had a blast in The President’s Bunker room! Chris was very helpful and helped make the experience challenging and fun at the same time. I absolutely recommend giving this place a try! I can’t wait to go back!

room_title: Escape room "The President’s Bunker" by The Great Escape Room in Grand Rapids
review: The Bunker Room was a blast - I would highly recommend it! The puzzles were just the right level of difficulty to make you think without getting frustrated. Thanks for helping to make my first escape room a fun experience, Sammi!

room_title: Escape room "The President’s Bunker" by The Great Escape Room in Grand Rapids
review: We did The Bunker escape room, which only had a 21% escape rate, and we managed to get out of there with 6 minutes to spare. Daryann was our "Secret Service Agent in Charge" and she was great at helping us understand the escape room concept but still not giving anything away. We thoroughly enjoyed ourselves!
